items.sentence: We played together every day when we were kids.
We went to Boston last year for the first time.
We want to spend the holidays in a quiet place.
Tom only eats vegetables that he grows himself.
Tom pounded the table violently with his fists.
Tom said he would come, but he never showed up.
Have you still not finished paying for my bike?
I hope to graduate from university next spring.
I hope you two will be as happy as Mary and me.
I joined a gym a few years back to lose weight.
